root.name: Nethergate: Resurrection
root.description: OverviewThis game is a re-release in newer technology of the game Nethergate by Spiderweb software. It is a isometric rpg that focusses on story and gameplay and uses a refined but rather old looking interface.Story:Britannia is a land ravaged by war. The natives of this land, the savage Celts, have long been subjugated by the Roman invaders. At last, they have risen up in bloody rebellion. Battles rage across the land. Cities are sacked, the inhabitants massacred. And, lost in the chaos, in the small, forgotten valley of Shadowvale, a plan is being formed.Soon, a band of barbarians will rediscover the lost secrets of magic. They will find a way to rid their lands of their oppressors forever. And you, as the Celtic warriors, will attempt to free your people.Or you, as the Romans, will attempt to crush them. For the good of the Empire.PC System RequirementsPC Running Windows 2000 or later or Macintosh running System 10.3.9 or later.50 MB free RAM.50 MB hard disk space.800x600 screen resolution with 16 bit color (Windows) or 32 bit color (Macintosh).Nethergate: Resurrection runs natively on Intel Macintoshes.
